trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The yuan-ti’s spellcasting ability is

trait.name: Charisma (spell save DC 12)
text: The yuan-ti can innately
cast the following spells, requiring no material
components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only)
3/day each: poison spray, suggestion

trait.name: Dreamer’s Amulet
text: When in possession of this item,
the yuan-ti can also innately cast the following spells:
2/day each: crown of madness, ray of sickness, sleep

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving
throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft.,

action.name: one target
text: Hit: 4 (1d6+1) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range
80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage
plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The broodling has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The broodling makes two attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4+1) slashing damage.
